## 🚀 LBS BLOCKCHAIN CONFERENCE 2022!!! 🚀 

### LBS Blockchain presents: Welcome to Web 3.0 - London Business School’s first ever blockchain conference ✨

#### Meet & hear from expert guest speakers on topics in the ever-expanding realm of blockchain. Over the course of the 3 days, we'll be covering Venture Capital, Start-ups, and Fundraising in Web 3.0; Decentralized Finance (DeFi); and Gaming, NFTs, and the Metaverse. 

🗓 When: April 26 - 28, 2022 <br>
📍 Where: Sussex Place <br>
[Check out the LBS Blockchain Conference Website](https://conference.lbs-blockchain.com)
